p: All Chemicals and reagents were obtained from the Hi-Media laboratory, Mumbai, and solvents were procured from SD Fine Chemical, Mumbai. Diclofenac Sodium was procured from IPCA laboratories, Mumbai, and Albendazole suspension was purchase from a medical shop. Adult earthworms ( Eisenia foetida) were purchased from Bio-Resources Development Centre, Shillong, Meghalaya vide bill no. BRD6/2015/Pt.III/20 dated 04/04/2019. Male albino rats were collected from the Institutional Animal Ethical Committee (IAEC) approved animal house of our institute.
